weka.classifiers.collective

Interface CollectiveClassifier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Classifier, OptionHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RestartableCollectiveClassifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedCollective, Chopper, CollectiveEM, CollectiveForest, CollectiveIBk, CollectiveNeighbor, CollectiveRandomizableClassifier, CollectiveRandomizableMultipleClassifiersCombiner, CollectiveRandomizableSingleClassifierEnhancer, CollectiveTree, CollectiveWoods, CollectiveWrapper, FilteredCollectiveClassifier, LLGC, SimpleCollective, TwoStageCollective, Weighting, YATSI

    public interface CollectiveClassifier
extends Classifier, OptionHandler
    Interface that all collective classifiers implement.
    Version:
    $Revision: 2019 $
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at cs dot waikato dot ac dot nz)

      • setSplitFolds

        void setSplitFolds(int value)
        Set the percentage for splitting the train set into train and test set. Use 0 for no splitting, which results in test = train.
        Parameters:
        value - the split percentage (1/splitFolds*100)

      • getSplitFolds

        int getSplitFolds()
        Gets the split percentage for splitting train set into train and test set
        Returns:
        the split percentage (1/splitFolds*100)

      • setInvertSplitFolds

        void setInvertSplitFolds(boolean value)
        Sets whether to use the first fold as training set (= FALSE) or as test set (= TRUE).
        Parameters:
        value - whether to invert the folding scheme

      • setUseInsight

        void setUseInsight(boolean value)
        Whether to use the labels of the test set to output more statistics (not used for learning and only for debugging purposes)
        Parameters:
        value - if true, more statistics are output

      • getUseInsight

        boolean getUseInsight()
        Returns whether we use the labels of the test set to output some more statistics.
        Returns:
        true if more statistics are output
